abstract: Toyota may create a separate brand for its Prius hybrid car and could add both larger and smaller Prius models to the lineup.
snippet: Toyota may create a separate brand for its Prius hybrid car and could add both larger and smaller Prius models to the lineup.
lead_paragraph: ANN ARBOR, Mich.  Toyota Motor may create a separate brand for its Prius hybrid car and could add both larger and smaller Prius models to the lineup, the head of Toyota’s American sales division said Thursday.

headline.main: Toyota May Make Prius a Brand and Widen the Model Lineup
headline.print_headline: Toyota May Make Prius a Brand and Widen the Model Lineup
